967: COCOCAKES By Coco has been one of Atlanta's leading cake-destinations for decades. Our Founder has been in business in Atlanta since 1996. We've gone from being voted for 'Best Desserts' in 2009 by the Atlanta Journal Constitution, to being featured in Atlanta Magazine twice! We're looking for crew members who can work various shifts on Thursday through Sunday - from bakers and cashiers to cake icers and dishwashers - to play an essential role in the company's growth & expansion. Ideal for students and those wanting extra money, these part time positions offer flexible shifts and cake discounts! We have two locations: Tucker, GA and Atlanta, GA (Westside Beltline Trail) Apply online at ! Hourly pay is $10 -15 based on your experience & position hired for. Pay raises based on regular performance reviews.
